name: Bad Blood
description:
Bad Blood is a RPG game developed by Origin Systems. It came out on 01-01-1990. Origin Systems published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Bad Blood on PC and Commodore / Amiga.
John Watson and Warren Spector produced the game. It was directed by Chris Roberts. Jeroen Godfried Tel, Marc Schaefgen and Steve Morris scored the game.
